title: Blog API with Authentication
description: A full-featured REST API for a blogging platform. Includes user registration, login, email verification, forgot/reset password, and post CRUD operations.

title: EACReservation Dashboard
description: A React-based admin dashboard for managing seat reservations at EAC events. Includes UI for viewing bookings and user activity.

title: Inventory Management System
description: A TypeScript console-based project showcasing object-oriented programming for tracking stock levels, adding and updating items, and reporting.

title: React Portfolio Website
description: A single-page portfolio site built with React, showcasing personal projects, experience, and contact form. Built with hooks, JSON-based content, and custom CSS.
